name: Remove Unwanted P tag from content
author: Chetan Satasiya

sections.description: This plugin will remove the unwanted p tag from the content.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Remove Unwanted P tag from content’
  3. Activate Remove Unwanted P tag from content from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Remove Unwanted P tag from content.
  2. Upload the ‘remove-unwanted-p-tag-from-content’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Remove Unwanted P tag from content from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:

  • Removed contributor

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.
